fields.name: Pass the Kernel
fields.description: Ends your turn without you having to click the kernel.

fields.name: Pinch of lucky salt
fields.description: Applies salt that increases your chance to draw a card with every click.

fields.name: Lucky Butter Waterfall
fields.description: Applies butter that guarantees that you can draw a card with every click.

fields.name: Burnt Rough Estimator
fields.description: Roughly estimates till when the next burnt popcorn is.

fields.name: Burnt Good Estimator
fields.description: Estimates till when the next burnt popcorn is.

fields.name: Burnt Tracker
fields.description: Gives you exactly how many clicks till the next burnt popcorn.

fields.name: Shake the Kernels
fields.description: Shakes and shuffles up the burnt popcorn

fields.name: Open the Door for a Little
fields.description: If possible, opens the mircowave door and delays the burn by 5 clicks

fields.name: Open the Door for a Long While
fields.description: If possible, opens the mircowave door and delays the burn for up to 20 clicks
fields.image: mircowave door open a long while.jpg
